description:
How often do you share your blog post on Twitter by hand?

Or make a note in Asana or Basecamp to follow up with a prospect who made contact through your CRM?

Imagine every app you use talking to each other seamlessly, without you being involved.

In this course you'll learn how to:
-Make Twitter mentions show up in Asana
-Send personalized LinkedIn invites based on Infusionsoft form completions
-Get text messages when you get paid through PayPal
-And 7 more implementations

You can skip around the course as much as you like.

Want to implement everything YouTube right away? Go for it- check out the Connect YouTube lecture and the YouTube to RSS & LinkedIn lecture.

By the end of this course, you'll have your first apps talking to each other through Zapier and have more ideas for what to implement next.
title: How I Automate Everything with Zapier
